all.description: enable all features except for swap16bitcsp

cwebp.description: Build the cwebp command line tool.

dwebp.description: Build the dwebp command line tool.

info.description: Build the webpinfo command line tool.

mux.description: Build the webpmux command line tool.

swap16bitcsp.description: Enable byte swap for 16 bit colorspaces.

unicode.description: Build Unicode executables. (Adds definition UNICODE and _UNICODE)

vwebp-sdl.description: Build the vwebp viewer tool for SDL.
